name: The Fragmented Past
text: When Revealed: Discard each attached copy of Magnetized Debris. Forced Response: After you play a [[magnetic]] card, take 2 damage. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Lorna Dane → remove The Fragmented Past from the game.

name: "Daddy Issues"
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Magneto minion and put it into play engaged with you. Seek a [[magnetic]] card from the Polaris player's deck and attach it facedown under the Magneto minion. If Magneto did not enter play this way, place 2[per_hero] threat here. [acceleration]

name: Magneto
text: Forced Response: After a [[magnetic]] event or treachery has been resolved, attach it facedown under here. Forced Interrupt: When Magneto would take any amount of damage, if there are any [[magnetic]] cards attached under here, discard one of them instead. (Polaris’s nemesis minion.)

name: Magnetized Shrapnel
text: When Revealed: Take 3 indirect damage. The Polaris player may spend X [energy] resource to prevent X of that damage. [star]Boost: Take 1 indirect damage. Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
